thread.title: Chris: Highs will reach mid-80s
thread.title_full: Chris: Highs will reach mid-80s - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Chris Franklin, Meteorologist
title: Chris: Highs will reach mid-80s
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - Drier air allows for morning to get almost chilly with temps in the 40s, 50s, and low 60s but afternoons very warm in the mid 80s.
Another cold front moves through early Saturday, bringing with it much cooler air. Highs over the weekend only in the 70s.
The pleasant weather continues into early next week. For more weather, click here.
Follow me on Twitter: @CFranklinFOX8
